ChatParty


介绍

When you have a server with more than 20 slots, the chat will be overloaded, it will be hard to follow the chat. Many of the chat messages on a server are not addressed to the public, but to a small group of players.
This plugin allows players to create their own chat parties and invite other players to them. Only the members of the party can see the chat messages.
The creator of the party can assign additional leaders who can also invite and kick players. When all leaders left the party, it disbands automatically.


当你的服务端里面有超过20个聊天窗口时，这个聊天窗口将会停止下载(意思是停止工作了)，这将会很难允许去(进行)聊天。很多聊天信息在服务端里不是面向公众的，而是面向一小部分玩家的。(就是讲你们的聊天别人是看不见的·无聊你们在聊什么奇怪的内容·)

这个插件允许玩家去创造他们自己的聊天群并且邀请其他玩家加入他们。只有这个群的成员才可以看到聊天信息。
群的创建者可以分配给其他玩家额外的管理员(类似于QQ群的群主给别人群管理员)，且管理员也可以进行邀请和踢除其他玩家。当所有的群管理离开了这个群，这个群就会自动解散。
怎样创建一个群How to create a party
Players with the permission chatparty.leader can create a party with the command:/party create <name>.The name of the party will be displayed when they invite other players. They can use their guild or faction name.After that, they can invite other players with /party invite <player> and promote their members to leaders with /party leader <player>Invited players can accept the invitation with /party join, or just ignore it.Players can only join one party at a time!
玩家的聊天群许可。群主使用一个指令可以创建一个群:/party create <name>假设·老纸要创建一个名为FFF的群那么老纸需要输入指令:/party create FFF当他们邀请其他玩家时群的名称会显示。他们可以用他们的公会或帮派的名称。(好像意思就是··邀请其他玩家的时候会显示群名·就像是QQ群·)在那之后，他们可以用“/party invite <player>”来邀请其他玩家，而且可以使用“/party leader <player>”来推选他们的成员去领导。(后面那段的意思好像是：使用/party leader <player>指令可以推选群主)
被邀请的玩家可以用“/party join”指令来接受邀请，或者只是忽略它。玩家只能同时加入一个群！(玩家最多只能同时加入一个群·)群聊窗口Party Chat
Players need the chatparty.user permission (included in chatparty.leader) to use the party chat command: /p <message>.
The plugin supports colored names and nicknames (e.g. set by Essentials).
Users can also display a list of all party members with /party members
Users can toggle the party chat with /party toggle, so they don't have to type /p all the time.

玩家需要聊天窗口。可以使用“/p <信息>”指令来来发送群消息。
(外国佬的言语表达与天朝大大的不一样·
老纸看了下面插件列表的介绍才明白这里在讲什么)
这个插件支持彩色昵称和物品名称(需要在Ess里面设置)
用户还可以用“/party members”指令来列一张表格显示所有的群成员
用户还可以用“/party toggle”指令打开群聊窗口，所以无论何时他们都不需要输入“/p”指令
(toggle的意思是切换·但这里不译成“打开”就不符合中文的表达习惯了)

管理工具

Admin Tools
Admins with the chatparty.admin permission can enable the spy mode with /party spy. They will see all party messages and actions.
It's similar to the /socialspy command of Essentials.

聊天群的管理员。管理员权限可以使用“/party spy”指令进入监控模式。他们可以看到群里所有的信息和动作。

这是类似于Ess插件中的“/socialspy指令”的指令推荐
Recommendation
I recommend you to give all players the chatparty.leader permission so they can form groups as soon as they join the server.
Advertise the command:

at spawnin your rule book (http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/standardbooks/)with an automessager plugin (http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/zavautomessager/)with an automessager plugin (http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/zavautomessager/)

I would allow cussing in party chats (if you disallow it in public chat).

我建议你给所有玩家(加入)聊天群。一旦他们加入服务器，他们就可以在群主同意下组成群组。公告命令:在出生地里在你的规则手册里 (http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/standardbooks/)加在自动留言插件里 (http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/zavautomessager/)

我将允许谩骂在群聊窗口里(如果你不允许它在公共聊天里)。
↑老外想表达的是：如果你不允许有人在公屏上骂人，那么我将允许他们在群聊窗口里面私下谩骂(老外·)

Command List (0.3.0 and higher)CommandDescriptionPermission/party or /party helpPlugin helpchatparty.user/chatToggle the global chatchatparty.user/p <message>Send a message to the partychatparty.user/party joinAccept a party invitationchatparty.user/party leaveLeave a partychatparty.user/party membersDisplay a list of leaders and memberschatparty.user/party toggleToggle the party chat (So you don't have to type /p)chatparty.user/party create <name>Create a new partychatparty.leader/party invite <player>Invite a player into the party
(原Create a new party作者抽了←_←)chatparty.leader/party kick <player>Kick a player from the partychatparty.leader/party leader <player>Promote a playerchatparty.leader/party spyMonitor all party chatschatparty.admin









配置 (0.3.0 和更高版本)
你可以修改/p指令的配置文件[/spoiler]
命令列表 (0.3.0 或更高版本)命令命令介绍许可/party or /party help插件帮助chatparty.user/chat切换到聊天窗口chatparty.user/p <message>发送聊天信息到群chatparty.user/party join接送群邀请chatparty.user/party leave离开群chatparty.user/party members列表显示群成员和群管理chatparty.user/party toggle打开聊天窗口(所以你不需要输入“/p”指令)chatparty.user/party create <name>创建一个新群chatparty.leader/party invite <player>邀请一个玩家入群chatparty.leader/party kick <player>从群里踢掉一个玩家chatparty.leader/party leader <player>推荐一个玩家为群主chatparty.leader/party spy监控所有玩家聊天chatparty.admin



配置信息(0.3.0或更高)
[spoiler]
Configuration (0.3.0 and higher)You can modify the behaviour of the /p command in the configuration:
ConfigDescriptioninvertPSetting invertP to true inverts the /p command when a user toggled the party chat (That means he can send a message to the public).toggleWithPSetting toggleWithP to true allows a user to toggle the party chat with the command /p, when no message is given.You can also modify the message color and the chat format:OptionDescriptionmessageColorColor of the plugin messages (Color Codes)chatFormatFormat of the party chat messages. Placeholders: {PARTYNAME}, {DISPLAYNAME}, {MESSAGE}



配置介绍invertP将invertP设置为true后，在用户打开了聊天窗口时，可以使用“/p”指令(这意味着他可以将消息发送到公屏上)。toggleWithP将toggleWithP设置为true后，当没有新消息时，允许用户打开群聊天命令/ p


您还可以修改调整聊天文字的颜色和格式(粗体斜体下划线等等):
设置介绍Description信息颜色插件信息的颜色(颜色代码)字体格式聊天信息的格式：比如{群名}, {显示的群名}, {信息}

The /p command is used by many plugins (like VoxelSniper).
